WidthPages Property

CDXML Name:WidthPages
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_WidthPages
CDX Constant Value:0x080F
Data Size:INT16
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Page
First written/read in:ChemDraw 6.0
Required?No

Description:

The width of the document in pages.

This property is meaningful only for documents with a DrawingSpaceType of type Pages.

If this property is absent:

The document is assumed to be one page wide.
